title: Sint-Mariaburg railway station
text:
Sint-Mariaburg is a <a href="railway%20station">railway station</a> in the town of <a href="Ekeren">Ekeren</a>, <a href="Antwerp%20%28province%29">Antwerp</a>, <a href="Belgium">Belgium</a>. The station opened in 1934 on the <a href="Antwerp%E2%80%93Lage%20Zwaluwe%20railway">Antwerp–Lage Zwaluwe railway</a>, known in Belgium as Line 12.
Train services.
